channel.title: Global Game Jam on João's site
channel.description: Recent content in Global Game Jam on João's site

item.title: Global Game Jam 2020
item.description: A 48-hour gobal game jam. IME hosted a site and we divided USPGameDev into two groups. My group created “Keeping It Up”, a game about keeping your constructions up while you defend the city agains evil aliens. The theme was “Repair”. Project: Engine: Godot My role: Graphic designer Links: Repository Entry

item.title: Global Game Jam 2019
item.description: A 48-hour gobal game jam. IME hosted a site and we divided USPGameDev into two groups. My group created “Mother’s home”, a game where you are a little creative kid, that adventures through an imaginary maze in his house to play with his toys, but don’t want to get far from his mom. The theme was “What home means to you”, and the game explores how the house feels like an unknown place to the kid, as his mother is his real home.
